notes.text:
Such a great deck, would be even greater if i didnt have the trap in my starting hand every single game

im not joking btw, from gold 3 all the way to King of Games there were only 3-4 games i didnt have it in my starting hand. i was raging so hard. Gravekeepers, Bujin, Sylvans and Armoage all rely on a single card to open with so they run 3 copies and restart. nah the real trick is to only run two...

this version is copy pasted straight from the recent giveaway tourney, extremely weak to cosmic cyclone but most people running around right now only had a single copy. EZ
